title: Poster, 2010-21-6, ca. 1971
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: Close up of a man frowning, wrinkles and pores on skin accentuated; eye colored in with green, blue, purple, magenta, and red blood vessels (in corner). Inscription top center: "Bostonsky pripad," and lower left: "Americky film s Tony Curtisem, / Henry Fondou a Jirim Voskoveem / Rezie: Richard Fleischer."
